Articles.Content: Hey I just download the bd armory mod and really been struggling to figure out how to use it properly. I cant seem to be able to target any thing, I double click on what I want to target and fire the missile but ot doesn't even change directions. I think i might be doing something wrong. Can someone help me?
Questions about mods themselves should be here.

28 minutes ago, PlatinumWolf said:

Hey I just download the bd armory mod and really been struggling to figure out how to use it properly. I cant seem to be able to target any thing, I double click on what I want to target and fire the missile but ot doesn't even change directions. I think i might be doing something wrong. Can someone help me?

Please consult the ingame KSPedia for detailed information on the operation of BDAc 

If you have any further questions afterwards, then feel free to contact us at the following thread and the team will do our best to assist you

 

Edited April 16, 2017 by DoctorDavinci
